name: Enhanced Wars - multiplayer, turn-based strategy evolved
blurb: Advance Wars meets Hero Academy in this familiar but fresh take on multiplayer, turn-based strategy games.

rewards.reward: ETERNAL GRATITUDE PACK\r\n==============================\r\nYou will earn our eternal gratitude for helping to support Enhanced Wars. If gratitude is not enough, you will also receive Enhanced Wars desktop wallpaper, a mention in the game credits, a special in-game Backer badge and early access to the developer forums.

THE GAME — (LIMITED EARLY BIRD SPECIAL)
==============================
You will receive a copy of Enhanced Wars on the platform of your choice upon its Open Beta release, as well as unlimited web access. You will get a bonus copy of the game to share with a friend and the True Believer in-game badge.
============================== 
ALSO INCLUDES: ==============================
All ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

THE GAME
==============================
You will receive a copy of Enhanced Wars on the platform of your choice upon its Open Beta release, as well as unlimited web access and a bonus copy of the game to share with a friend.
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ==============================
All ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

CLOSED BETA ACCESS — EARLY BIRD SPECIAL
==============================
You will get Closed Beta access to Enhanced Wars, the True Believer badge and access to the bi-weekly Dev Call. 
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== 
All THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

CLOSED BETA ACCESS
==============================
You will get Closed Beta access to Enhanced Wars
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== 
All THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

CLOSED BETA — DIGITAL DELUXE  — EARLY BIRD SPECIAL
==============================
In addition to Closed Beta access, the True Believer badge and Dev Call access, you will also receive the Enhanced Wars Digital Poster, Print & Play copy of the original Enhanced Wars Prototype and Papercraft Set. 
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ==============================
All THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

CLOSED BETA — DIGITAL DELUXE
==============================
In addition to Closed Beta access you will also receive the Enhanced Wars Digital Poster, Print & Play copy of the original Enhanced Wars Prototype and Papercraft Set. 
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== 
All THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

CLOSED ALPHA ACCESS — EARLY BIRD SPECIAL
==============================
After the Kickstarter campaign is complete, only backers with Alpha access will be able to play and take part in the ongoing development of the game until the time of the Closed Beta. Additionally, you will receive the True Believer badge and Dev Call access. 
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ==============================
All DIGITAL DELUXE, THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

CLOSED ALPHA ACCESS 
==============================
After the Kickstarter campaign is complete, only backers with Alpha access will be able to play and take part in the ongoing development of the game until the time of the Closed Beta.
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== 
All DIGITAL DELUXE, THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

THE COUNCIL OF 13 — EARLY BIRD SPECIAL
==============================
This package includes a seat on the Player Council and a special designation as a member of The Council of 13. This is the only way to get the unique The Council of 13 badge and other nefarious rewards to be determined. You will also receive the True Believer Badge, The Player Council badge and Dev Call access. 
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== 
All CLOSED ALPHA, DIGITAL DELUXE, THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

THE PLAYER COUNCIL
==============================
Help shape the future of Enhanced Wars as a member of the exclusive Player Council. In addition to a seat on the Council, you will receive the Player Council badge and Dev Call access.
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== 
All CLOSED ALPHA, DIGITAL DELUXE, THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

ALL ACCESS PACK
==============================
For the player who wants the truly inside scoop, get access to our design documents! 
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ==============================
All PLAYER COUNCIL, CLOSED ALPHA, DIGITAL DELUXE, THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

MAP MAKER
==============================
Help design the game! Work directly with the dev team to design a map that will appear prominently in game with special credit as well as the True Believer badge.
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== 
All ALL ACCESS, PLAYER COUNCIL, CLOSED ALPHA, DIGITAL DELUXE, THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

MODE MAKER
==============================
Help design the game! Work directly with the dev team to design a gameplay mode/objective set that will appear prominently in-game with special credit, as well as the True Believer badge. 
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ==============================
All ALL ACCESS, PLAYER COUNCIL, CLOSED ALPHA, DIGITAL DELUXE, THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.

VIP
==============================
Get access to a unique, custom faction skin that will only ever be given to our VIP backers.
============================== ALSO INCLUDES: ============================== 
All ALL ACCESS, PLAYER COUNCIL, CLOSED ALPHA, DIGITAL DELUXE, THE GAME and ETERNAL GRATITUDE rewards.
